case.title: Professional Black Lady Seeks Good Natured White Man - 35 (England)
case.text: Young looking, attractive, caring, active, educated 35 year old black lady living in London. I am emotionally and financially secure. I would like friendship leading to a romantic relationship with a decent and pleasant white guy. Preferably someone who lives in London or surrounding counties. Please reply with an introduction of yourself, what city/area you live in, age, hobbies etc. Sending a photo is not mandatory. You never know till you try. (Polite notice - I am NOT looking for a casual/one-night-stand). Thank you.
